room_title: Escape room "The Penitentiary" by Locked A Syracuse Escape Room in Syracuse
room_description: Cell block 4, where you reside right now is the end of the road for you. You were sentenced to life with no chance for parole for a crime you didn’t commit. And the warden.. well he knows you are innocent but doesn’t seem to care too much. You have one hour to escape your cell, and the prison with the evidence of you being framed or spend the rest of your life behind bars.
